title: BOOKSTORE / COCKATOO
description: From A to Zrieek! Guide to a Well-Behaved Cockatoo. (Helen)

dialogueTree.title: From A to Zrieek! A Guide To a Well-Behaved Cockatoo: "A sulphur-crested cockatoo sits on..."
dialogueTree.actor: From A to Zrieek! A Guide To a Well-Behaved Cockatoo
dialogueTree.english: A sulphur-crested cockatoo sits on the cover, its beak slightly open. It looks as if the bird is calling out the book title: "From A to Zrieek! A Guide To A Well-Behaved Cockatoo."
dialogueTree.polish: Na okładce widnieje kakadu z czubem koloru siarki, lekko otwierając dziób. Wygląda to, jakby wymawiała ona tytuł książki: „Od A do wrZaaask! Jak wychować kakadu”.
dialogueTree.belarusian: На вокладцы намаляваны какаду з грабенем колеру серы, які лёгка адкрывае дзюбу. Выглядае, як быццам яна вымаўляе назву кнігі: "Ад А да Крыыык! Як выхоўваць какаду".

links.title: You: "Flip through the pages."
links.to: From A to Zrieek! A Guide To a Well-Behaved Cockatoo

links.title: From A to Zrieek! A Guide To a Well-Behaved Cockatoo: "Turns out that there are so many di..."
links.actor: From A to Zrieek! A Guide To a Well-Behaved Cockatoo
links.english: Turns out that there are so many different cockatoo species, and they all have behavioural problems.
links.polish: Okazuje się, że istnieje wiele różnych gatunków kakadu i każdy z nich ma swoje problemy behawioralne.
links.belarusian: Аказваецца, што існуе мноства розных відаў какаду, і кожны з іх мае свае паводніцкія праблемы.

links.title: Composure: "You don't have behavioural problems..."
links.english: You don't have behavioural problems. That's garbage. You're cool.
links.polish: Nie masz żadnych problemów behawioralnych. To bzdury. Jesteś czadowy.
links.belarusian: У цябе няма ніякіх паводзінкавых праблем. Гэта глупства. Ты класны.

links.title: You: ""What about this guide to cockatoos..."
links.to: From A to Zrieek! A Guide To a Well-Behaved Cockatoo
links.english: "What about this guide to cockatoos, storekeeper?"
links.polish: „Co to jest za przewodnik po kakadu, proszę pani?”
links.belarusian: "Што гэта за даведнік па какаду, калі ласка, пані?"

links.title: Plaisance: ""It's a must-have if you own a cock..."
links.english: "It's a must-have if you own a cockatoo. I've heard they're quite capricious."
links.polish: „To obowiązkowa pozycja dla właściciela kakadu. Słyszałam, że to bardzo kapryśne ptaki”.
links.belarusian: "Гэта абавязковая пазіцыя для ўладальніка какаду. Я чула, што гэта вельмі капрызныя птушкі".

links.title: You: ""I want to buy the guide to cockato..."
links.to: From A to Zrieek! A Guide To a Well-Behaved Cockatoo
links.english: "I want to buy the guide to cockatoos."
links.belarusian: "Я хачу купіць гэты гід па какаду."

links.title: Plaisance: ""Oh, a nature enthusiast! Good choi..."
links.english: "Oh, a nature enthusiast! Good choice. I *knew* it was a good idea to keep that around..."
links.polish: „Och! Miłośnik natury! Dobry wybór. *Wiedziałam*, że to dobry pomysł, aby mieć tę książkę na półce...”
links.belarusian: "Ах! Аматар прыроды! Добры выбар. *Я ведала*, што гэта добрая ідэя мець гэту кнігу на паліцы..."

links.title: Tutorial Agent: "You've acquired an interactable ite..."
links.english: You've acquired an interactable item. Investigate this item further by going to the INTERACT tab in your INVENTORY.
links.polish: Zdobyłeś przedmiot, z którym można wejść w interakcję. Przyjrzyj mu się uważniej, przechodząc do zakładki INTERAKCJI w twoim EKWIPUNKU.
links.belarusian: Вы набылі прадмет, з якім можна ўзаемадзейнічаць. Уважліва разгледзьце яго, перайшоўшы на ўкладку ЎЗАЕМАДЗЕЯННЕ ў вашым ІНВЕНТАРЫ.

links.title: You: "Steal the guide to cockatoos."
links.to: From A to Zrieek! A Guide To a Well-Behaved Cockatoo

links.title: Interfacing: "You wait for the storekeeper to be..."
links.english: You wait for the storekeeper to be distracted. When she's not looking, you haul the tome of cockatoos into your pocket.
links.polish: Czekasz, aż księgarka się rozproszy. Kiedy nie patrzy, chowasz książkę o kakadu do kieszeni.
links.belarusian: Чакаеш, пакуль кнігарка адцягнецца. Калі яна не глядзіць, хаваеш кнігу пра какаду ў кішэню.

links.title: Interfacing: "It's quite a challenge, but eventua..."
links.english: It's quite a challenge, but eventually the guide to cockatoos is yours. Splendid effort!
links.polish: To nie lada wyzwanie, ale w końcu przewodnik po kakadu jest twój. Wspaniała robota!
links.belarusian: Гэта нялёгкая задача, але ў рэшце рэшт кіраўніцтва па какату – тваё. Выдатная праца!

links.title: Interfacing: "Slowly, you move your hand toward t..."
links.english: Slowly, you move your hand toward the tome of cockatoos. Before you reach the book, you're interrupted:
links.polish: Powoli przesuwasz dłoń ku książce o kakadu. Zanim jednak jej dosięgasz, słyszysz głos:
links.belarusian: Павольна перамяшчаеш руку да кнігі пра какаду. Аднак перш чым яе дасягаеш, чуеш голас:

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant coughs sharply, then..."
links.english: The lieutenant coughs sharply, then whispers: "Do we really need to do this? I think not."
links.polish: Porucznik kasła głośno, po czym szepcze: „Czy naprawdę tego teraz potrzebujemy? Nie sądzę”.
links.belarusian: Лейтэнант гучна кашляе, затым шэпча: "Ці сапраўды нам гэта зараз патрэбна? Я так не думаю".

links.title: Plaisance: ""Sir, no touching the merchandise...."
links.english: "Sir, no touching the merchandise. People like their books pristine, not handled by god knows who."
links.polish: „Proszę nie dotykać towaru. Ludzie lubią, gdy zakupione książki są w nieskazitelnym stanie, a nie wyświechtane przez bóg wie kogo”.
links.belarusian: "Калі ласка, не чапайце тавар. Людзі любяць, калі купленыя кнігі ў бездакорным стане, а не патрапаныя бог ведае кім".

links.title: You: "[Leave.]"
links.to: From A to Zrieek! A Guide To a Well-Behaved Cockatoo
